title: Looking for Content Writers for Blogs and Websites
snippet:
I am looking for content writers for blogs and websites!!!
I need 13 English writers to join my team. Daily volume work, up to 4-6 articles per day. The writer should be versatile, should be able to work on a wide range of niches. Only apply if you can work under the deadlines. 500 words around 2 hours, 700 words around 3 hours, 1000 words around 3-4 hours.
All work must be submitted within the mentioned deadline or it will not be accepted. You will get bulk writing projects as well, but mostly you will get daily volume work one article after another. Make sure you read the posting then apply.
Long term job articles must pass copyscape, must be high quality. Every article will be checked by our editor for quality and assurance that you follow all the instructions properly and if not followed instructions properly the article will get rejected or asked for revisions.
Able to research the topic thoroughly and can redesign the content in an interesting way with attention grabbing headlines. No tolerance for low quality or plagiarized content. This is a regular work with easy deadlines.
